pv_evaluation.templates#

Contents#

render_inventor_disambiguation_report

Create html report based on disambiguation results.

Documentation#

HTML report templates.

pv_evaluation.templates.render_inventor_disambiguation_report(outdir, summary_table_files, cache=True, **kwargs)#

Create html report based on disambiguation results.

Parameters

  • outdir (str) – directory where to output html files.

  • summary_table_files (list) – list of paths to disambiguation table files (tables with the five columns “mention-id”, “inventor_id”, “patent_id”, “name_first”, and “name_last”). File format can be one of tsv, csv, or parquet.

  • cache (bool, optional) – whether or not to cache jupyter chunk execution between runs. Defaults to True.
